name: Cursed World
description:
It's time to know how to manage a small team! 

Play as three creatures who think they have nothing in common, leaving to save their kingdom from an evil that threatens their city and their loved ones. Will you be able to bind these three companions together, or turn them against each other? It's up to you. But don't forget... With several people, we are always stronger than alone.

This project was created in team with 2 DA directors :
Romain Campargue https://www.artstation.com/epdur
Helena HB (me) https://www.artstation.com/helenahb  

And a lot of amazing peoples : 
Artists : Jeanne Arazi-Berthet, Shanon Decaillon & Melodie Schaller
Game designer : Vincent Rigaud
Game programmers : Bastien Rappenecker & Gaetan Lebegue
Sound designer : Juliette Bougeard


Have fun and good luck with these three muleheads !
